descriptionlist.description:
A beautifully unified simple and familiar iOS theme... Now comes with custom wallpapers!

I built this theme to feel familiar while also communicating a coherent design language for your icons that third party developers, and even Apple, fail to provide. Stemming from the insect order Phasmida, I chose the name mida, with a lower case m, because the theme was designed to 'blend in'.



If you would like to support my work, feel free to donate using the link below!

If you would like to request an icon, feel free to tap the image above or this link to fill out the google form!

changelog.change: Added several requested icons. Wallpapers temporarily show up over some default one. No default wallpapers are deleted or removed.
